title: Dashboard page
domain_operation_data: You can edit the operation data
domain_operations_dashboard_info: Below, you will find all of the operations in progress. Depending on the operation, you may need to take action.

tracking_transfert_first_step_operation_: Nine steps performed by the robot before sending the request to the register.
tracking_transfert_second_step_title: Verifying that the contact information is valid.
tracking_transfert_second_step_info: During this time, the domain will remain functional until the DNSs have been modified.
tracking_transfert_second_step_mail: You may receive an email from your previous registrar inviting you to verify your contact information (this email will be sent to the address registered for the administrative contact in the WHOIS/RDAP).
tracking_transfert_second_step_validate: Please validate the transfer by following the link or instructions indicated in this message.
tracking_transfert_third_step_operation_: This process can take up to 5 to 7 days, depending on the rules of the registry concerned.
tracking_transfert_fourth_step_operation: Registration Data Directory Services (WHOIS and RDAP services)
